name: shackstats
description: Statistics for the Shacknews chatty forum
author: Brian Luft

scripts.prepublish: tsc && cp -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/papaparse/papaparse.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/chart.js/dist/Chart.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/moment-timezone/builds/moment-timezone-with-data.min.js web/ext/
